verses.verse: The <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H5662>Obadiah.<s%> This is what the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> about <S%H123>Edom.<s%> We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H8052>news<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and an <S%H6735>ambassador<s%> is <S%H7971>sent<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H6965>saying,<s%> "Arise, and <S%H6965>let<s%>'s rise up against her in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
<S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I have made you <S%H6996>small<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> You are <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H959>despised.<s%>

The <S%H2087>pride<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart<s%> has <S%H5377>deceived<s%> <S%H7931>you,<s%> you who dwell in the <S%H2288>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> whose <S%H3427>habitation<s%> is <S%H4791>high,<s%> who <S%H559>says<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H3381><s%> 'Who will bring me down to the <S%H776>ground?<s%>'

Though you mount on <S%H1361>high<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and though your <S%H7064>nest<s%> is <S%H7760>set<s%> among the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> I will bring you <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H5002>there,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"If <S%H1590>thieves<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7703>you,<s%> if robbers by <S%H3915>night<s%>— <S%H1820>oh,<s%> what disaster awaits <S%H1589>you<s%>— wouldn't they only steal until they had <S%H1767>enough?<s%> If grape <S%H1219>pickers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7604>you,<s%> wouldn't they leave some gleaning <S%H5955>grapes?<s%>
How <S%H6215>Esau<s%> will be <S%H2664>ransacked!<s%> How his <S%H4710>hidden<s%> treasures are sought <S%H2664>out!<s%>

All the <S%H582>men<s%> of your <S%H1285>alliance<s%> have <S%H7971>brought<s%> you on your <S%H1366>way,<s%> even to the border. The <S%H582>men<s%> who were at <S%H7965>peace<s%> with you have <S%H5377>deceived<s%> <S%H3201>you,<s%> and prevailed against <S%H3899>you.<s%> Friends who eat your bread <S%H7760>lay<s%> a <S%H4204>snare<s%> under <S%H8394>you.<s%> There is no understanding in him."

<S%H3117>"Won't<s%> I in that day," <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H6>"destroy<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men out of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> out of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau?<s%>

Your <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H8487>men,<s%> Teman, will be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> to the end that <S%H376>everyone<s%> may be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> by <S%H6993>slaughter.<s%>
For the <S%H2555>violence<s%> done to your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H955>shame<s%> will <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H3772>you,<s%> and you will be cut off <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the other <S%H3117>side,<s%> in the day that <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H7617>carried<s%> away his <S%H2428>substance,<s%> and <S%H5237>foreigners<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into his <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> even you were like one of <S%H259>them.<s%>

But <S%H7200>don't<s%> look down on your <S%H251>brother<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H5235>disaster,<s%> and <S%H8055>don't<s%> rejoice over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H6>destruction.<s%> <S%H6310>Don't<s%> speak <S%H1431>proudly<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>distress.<s%>

<S%H935>Don't<s%> enter into the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity.<s%> <S%H7200>Don't<s%> look down on their <S%H7451>affliction<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity,<s%> neither <S%H7971>seize<s%> their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity.<s%>

<S%H5975>Don't<s%> stand in the <S%H6563>crossroads<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> those of his who <S%H6412>escape.<s%> <S%H5462>Don't<s%> deliver up those of his who <S%H8300>remain<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>distress.<s%>

For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> all the <S%H1471>nations!<s%> As you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> it will be <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H1576>you.<s%> Your deeds will <S%H7725>return<s%> upon your own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

For as you have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> on my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> so will all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%> <S%H8354>Yes,<s%> they will drink, swallow <S%H3886>down,<s%> and will be as though they had not <S%H3808>been.<s%>

But in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> there will be those who <S%H6413>escape,<s%> and it will be <S%H6944>holy.<s%> The <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H4180>possessions.<s%>

The <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will be a <S%H784>fire,<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> a <S%H3852>flame,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> for <S%H7179>stubble.<s%> They will <S%H1814>burn<s%> among <S%H398>them,<s%> and devour <S%H8300>them.<s%> There will not be any remaining to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>" <S%H3068>Indeed,<s%> Yahweh has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

Those of the <S%H5045>South<s%> will <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> and those of the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> They will <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> will possess <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

The <S%H1546>captives<s%> of this <S%H2426>army<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who are among the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> will possess even to <S%H6886>Zarephath;<s%> and the <S%H1546>captives<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> who are in <S%H5614>Sepharad,<s%> will <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>Negev.<s%>

<S%H3467>Saviors<s%> will go <S%H5927>up<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> and the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> will be <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s.
